locationCriteria.name: State
locationCriteria.description: State in which the property is located

locationCriteria.name: County
locationCriteria.description: County in which the property is located. Expressed as a 4 or 5 digit FIPS code

locationCriteria.name: City
locationCriteria.description: City in which the property is located

locationCriteria.name: ZipFive
locationCriteria.description: ZIP Code in which the property is located

locationCriteria.name: Address
locationCriteria.description: The property address per county tax assessor records. Should include street number, street name, direction, type, and unit/suite number. Should NOT include city, state, or ZIP Code

locationCriteria.name: StreetName
locationCriteria.description: The name of the street without the street number, direction or type

locationCriteria.name: AddressNumber
locationCriteria.description: The number portion of the street address

locationCriteria.name: APN
locationCriteria.description: Assessors Parcel Number assigned by the tax assessors office to uniquely identify the property. Formatting including dashes must match

locationCriteria.name: Subdivision
locationCriteria.description: The name of the subdivision the property is located in as provided by the county assessor's office

locationCriteria.name: RadarID
locationCriteria.description: Unique ID for locating properties within PropertyRadar

locationCriteria.name: FIPS
locationCriteria.description: The 4 or 5-digit code assigned to the state and county under the Federal Information Processing Standards

locationCriteria.name: OddEven
locationCriteria.description: Is the property street number odd or even

locationCriteria.name: AddressComplete
locationCriteria.description: Whether or not the property address is complete and not Unknown

locationCriteria.name: StreetPrefix
locationCriteria.description: The predirection at the beginning of the street name - N, S, E, W, NE, NW, SE and SW

locationCriteria.name: StreetSuffix
locationCriteria.description: The post direction at ending of the street name - N, S, E, W, NE, NW, SE and SW

locationCriteria.name: CarrierRoute
locationCriteria.description: The 4-character USPS delivery route code in which the property is located

locationCriteria.name: TaxRateArea
locationCriteria.description: The tax rate area the property is located in as provided by the county assessor's office

locationCriteria.name: CensusTract
locationCriteria.description: A geographic region defined for the purpose of taking a U.S. Census, usually coincides with city or town limits or other administrative areas

locationCriteria.name: SiteCongressionalDistrict
locationCriteria.description: The number of the property's congressional district within the state, between 1st and 53rd

locationCriteria.name: DrawPolygon
locationCriteria.description: Draw exactly where you want your location by clicking on map to create polygon

locationCriteria.name: DrawRectangle
locationCriteria.description: Draw a rectangle where you click and drag your mouse on the map

locationCriteria.name: DrawCircle
locationCriteria.description: Draw a circle in the Map View with center point and radius

criteriaTypes.Multiple Values: Accepts an array of multiple values for matching
criteriaTypes.Multiple Values Beginning With: Similar to Multiple Value, except an exact match is not required; properties will be found if they merely begin with the given value
criteriaTypes.Multiple Range: Accepts a series of arrays with min and max values, e.g. [[100, 200], [300, 400]]
criteriaTypes.Single Value: Like Multiple Value but accepts only one value
criteriaTypes.Map Drawing: Uses interactive map interface to define geographic boundaries
